alpha: The value must contain only alphabetic characters.
in: The value must be one of the allowed values.
max_length: The value exceeds the maximum length.
max: The value must be less than or equal to the maximum.
min_length: The value does not meet the minimum length.
min: The value must be greater than or equal to the minimum.
not_in: The value must not be one of the disallowed values.
regex: The value does not match the required pattern.
required_if: This field is required when the condition is met.
required_unless: This field is required unless a specific condition is met.
required_without_all: This field is required when none of the specified fields are present.
required_without: This field is required when a specific field is not present.
required_with_all: This field is required when all specified fields are present.
required_with: This field is required when a specific field is present.
